title: Fundraising at National Review
author: VD
content_html:
As a part of their annual fund drive – which always seems a little strange coming from a conservative organization, I might add – NRO is going to be auctioning off one of the superflous letters from Ramesh Ponnuru’s last name. As I am a fan of NRO, I’m thinking of bidding on it.

I’m trying to decide on which letter I want. Voxu Day or Vox Nday. I think I’m leaning towards the latter.

“How do you pronounce that?”

“The three is silent.”

“Oh, ah.”
content_text:
As a part of their annual fund drive – which always seems a little strange coming from a conservative organization, I might add – NRO is going to be auctioning off one of the superflous letters from Ramesh Ponnuru’s last name.  As I am a fan of NRO, I’m thinking of bidding on it.
I’m trying to decide on which letter I want.  Voxu Day or Vox Nday.  I think I’m leaning towards the latter.
“How do you pronounce that?”
“The three is silent.”
“Oh, ah.”
